rComments: The most caring and understanding professor I've had! Not an easy grader and rambles a lot during lectures. Be prepared to do all the readings, even if it takes a while, she understands :)

Paula is a great person- she's very accessible and helpful if you talk to her in office hours. She's on of those professors that actually enjoys talking with her students. She's really laid back so don't be afraid of her ! Modern Jewish Experience was easy

Nicest lady ever, I highly recommend this class. I went into the class not interested in the topic and left the class extremely interested. If you don't like the class you should get to know her better. One of the most helpful teachers at UCSC, more than understanding of any problems personal/professional that the student may have. P Dac rocks.

Easy A, class attendance was mandatory, one essay for the final and a take home midterm. If you see her during Office Hours and talk, she will like you and give you a better grade if she knows your name. Class size is small too so she notices if your absent. She's open to any topical question about Jewish Studies as well.

Class lecture was dry and unappealing, used only Microsoft Word projected and read off it. Attendance is mandatory which is painful but class was easy. If you want a class where you can sit in the back on your laptop and do other work then this is fine, if you want to learn a lot and be engaged, pass.
